member.name: IMFMediaKeySessionNotify.KeyAdded
member.summary: Notifies the application that the key has been added.

member.name: IMFMediaKeySessionNotify.KeyError
member.summary: Notifies the application that an error occurred while processing the key.

member.name: IMFMediaKeySessionNotify.KeyMessage
member.summary: Passes information to the application so it can initiate a key acquisition.
member.param: The URL to send the message to.
The message to send to the application.
The length in bytes of message.

member.name: IMFMediaKeySessionNotify
member.summary: Provides a mechanism for notifying the app about information regarding the media key session.
